DataElement.preferredName: Breast Lymphedema Symptom Survey Last Seven Days How Much Does It Bother You Score Likert Scale Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how often in the last seven days their breast lymphedema symptoms have bothered them, using a Likert scale value captured as a non-enumerated text field.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Breast Lymphedema Symptom Survey Last Seven Days How Much Does It Bother You Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to measure the degree of distress associated with the signs and symptoms of lymphedema in an operated breast._The most recent week, including today._A question about how much something bothers an individual._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to measure the degree of distress associated with the signs and symptoms of lymphedema in an operated breast.

Concepts.definition: A self-administered questionnaire designed to measure the degree of distress associated with the signs and symptoms of lymphedema in an operated breast.

Property.preferredName: Past Week How Much Does It Bother You Score
Property.preferredDefinition: The most recent week, including today.:A question about how much something bothers an individual.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: How Much Does It Bother You
Concepts.definition: A question about how much something bothers an individual.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.
